title: 1186d80ec14d1a1dbae2e0e0db53bb5e812a2af72d4fe0e31dcccc9858112011
description:
This is our Final version as BrdRip from the excellent "Terminator" limited edition 2012 metal box.
The best bluray version of this specific movie for sure.

This version is now in full screen resolution hd.1080p without dismorphic alteration.

Available spoken language :

English in Dts-5.1 HD HRA (untouched)
French in Dts-5.1 HD MA (untouched)

Available subtitle :

English,French and Netherland/Dutch (untouched)

Format : mkv
Video codec use : h264 aka x264

Final size : 17,6 Gb

-----------------------------------------------

V=8,75 (still a bit grained in certain scenes...)but very very acceptable anyway.

A=9 (a few micro distortion...sometimes...)

Final result : very good quality for sure.

no need to show you any screenshot...
Or you trust us or you don't...

see imdb right here : <a href="
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0088247/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0088247/</a>

-----------------------------------------------
